info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9609
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;app.pix.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 9609
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;app.pix.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
app.pix.fr.	10750	IN	CNAME	pix-app.baleen.cshield.net.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
baleen.cshield.net.	300	IN	SOA	ns1.p10.dynect.net. depot\.domaine.cdiscount.com. 2022043029 3600 600 604800 300
